data.headline: Create Deepfakes with AI on Deepfakes Web

faqs.question: How does the deepfake creation process work?
faqs.answer: To create a deepfake, upload your source and target videos, let the AI learn and render the video, and then download or watch your newly created deepfake video.

faqs.question: What are 'Cloud Credits'?
faqs.answer: Cloud credits are used to pay for the high powered GPU usage required to create deepfake videos. Approximately 10 credits are used per minute of usage, with advanced mode consuming 5x more cloud usage.

faqs.question: Do credits expire?
faqs.answer: Yes, credits expire 6 months from the date of purchase. Prices for credits change frequently.

faqs.question: What is the cost to make a video?
faqs.answer: Creating a basic mode video requires 300 credits ($15) for 10,000 learning iterations. For a face-swap using a pre-trained model, 100 credits ($5) are needed.

faqs.question: What are the free and premium plans?
faqs.answer: The Basic plan is free but requires separate credit purchase for video creation. The Premium plan offers advanced mode features for $9 monthly.

faqs.question: What are the size and duration limits for uploaded videos?
faqs.answer: The Basic mode allows a maximum size of 50MB and duration of 150 seconds. The Advanced mode supports 100MB files and up to 300 seconds.

faqs.question: Can the platform handle 4K or HD videos?
faqs.answer: 4K and HD videos are supported in Advanced mode. In Basic mode, videos are resized to a width of 1440px.

faqs.question: What happens if the credits are insufficient during video creation?
faqs.answer: The video creation process will not be stopped midway, even if the purchased credits are insufficient.

faqs.question: How to ensure the quality of deepfake videos?
faqs.answer: Reuse your trained model to improve face-swapping quality or to make additional videos without retraining.

faqs.question: How does Deepfakes Web ensure responsible use of deepfake technology?
faqs.answer: The platform uses digital watermarks and creates videos with intentional imperfections to ensure they can be identified as fake.

data.description: Deepfakes Web allows users to easily create deepfake videos online. With a user-friendly interface, it provides tools for swapping faces in videos by utilizing advanced AI technology. Users can simply upload their source and target videos, click a button, and let the AI do the rest, making the process straightforward and highly efficient.
data.summary: Deepfakes Web offers a variety of AI-powered services including Celebrity Deepfakes, AI Image Generator, and Premium subscriptions for creating deepfake videos. The platform provides both a free Basic plan and a Premium plan, which offers advanced features for a monthly fee. Users can sign up using their email and create videos by uploading source and target videos that the AI will process and render. The site employs responsible practices such as adding digital watermarks to videos for easy identification and ensures user privacy by keeping learning data and videos private.

data.description:

The fundamental purpose of Dora AI is to significantly reduce the time, cost, and effort traditionally associated with website development by leveraging artificial intelligence to generate bespoke designs from simple user prompts. This tool enables users to create websites that are not only visually compelling but also optimized for user engagement and usability.

The core features of Dora AI include AI-driven design generation, which allows for the creation of original designs without the reliance on stock templates or images. It customizes content based on the user's prompt, intelligently arranging images, text, and UI elements to enhance user engagement. Among its future-ready capabilities is the promise of incorporating AI-generated 3D visuals and animations, positioning it ahead of the curve in website design innovation.

Dora AI finds its applications across various domains. Web designers can utilize it to create custom designs efficiently, while marketing professionals might use it to produce targeted landing pages. Entrepreneurs, educational institutions, non-profits, and bloggers can also benefit from its capabilities to create unique, purpose-driven web spaces. 

A distinguishing advantage of Dora AI is its ability to generate complete websites with customized content, design, and visual identity from a single prompt, offering a level of creativity and flexibility unmatched by template-based website builders. 

The technical framework of Dora AI is based on a web-based application accessible via browser, employing a credit system model for user access to features. While its integration capabilities with other platforms are currently limited, this area holds potential for future enhancements.

Although the tool has not been highlighted with specific awards or recognitions, its visibility on platforms like Product Hunt and Futurepedia signifies its impact and acceptance in the tech community dedicated to AI and website development.

As for recent updates, Dora AI is still in its beta phase, with ongoing developments focused on advanced features such as AI-generated 3D and animations, reflecting its continued evolution and commitment to providing cutting-edge website design solutions.
data.summary: Dora AI is an advanced AI-powered website builder that simplifies website creation for both beginners and professionals. By using artificial intelligence, it creates custom designs from straightforward user prompts, bypassing the need for traditional coding and template-based approaches. The tool is capable of producing visually appealing, user-engagement optimized websites, and plans to further innovate with AI-generated 3D graphics and animation features. data.description:
PDF.ai is an innovative AI-powered tool designed to revolutionize how users interact with PDF documents. Its core purpose is to simplify information retrieval and enhance document comprehension through an intuitive, conversational interface , , .

The tool offers a range of key features, including an AI-powered chat interface for natural language queries, automatic document summarization, accurate data extraction, and multilingual support , , , . It also provides secure document handling, a Chrome extension for seamless browser integration, and advanced tagging and categorization capabilities , , .

PDF.ai caters to a wide array of use cases across various industries. Researchers can quickly extract data from papers, legal professionals can analyze documents efficiently, HR departments can streamline resume processing, and students can summarize textbooks with ease . Businesses benefit from simplified document workflows, while writers and hobbyists can organize and extract information from large text volumes , .

The tool's unique selling point lies in its AI-powered chat interface, which offers a more natural and intuitive way to interact with PDFs compared to traditional methods , , . Its combination of advanced features and focus on security sets it apart from competitors , .

While specific technical requirements are not detailed, PDF.ai requires a stable internet connection and is compatible with various operating systems and devices, including Chrome browsers via its extension , .

In terms of integration, PDF.ai offers API access for developers to incorporate its functionalities into custom applications and workflows. It also integrates with popular cloud storage services for convenient document access .

PDF.ai has gained significant traction, boasting over 1,350,000 users according to one source , although specific awards or recognitions are not mentioned in the provided information.

Recent updates to PDF.ai include the integration of the GPT-4o language model for improved accuracy and reasoning, enhanced tagging and categorization features, and the ability to ask questions in a different language than the document's original language . Additionally, users can now capture and ask questions about specific sections of a PDF, further enhancing the tool's functionality and user experience .
data.summary: PDF.ai is a powerful AI-driven tool aimed at transforming PDF document interaction by streamlining information retrieval and enhancing document comprehension through an intuitive chat-based interface. With features like automatic document summarization, multilingual support, secure document management, and a handy Chrome extension, PDF.ai serves diverse professional needs from researchers and legal professionals to HR and students. Its distinguishing AI chat interface offers a natural method of engaging with PDFs, setting it apart with superior document workflow solutions and security.

data.description:
Chat With Data, also known as DataChat, is a cutting-edge no-code, generative AI analytics platform tailored for business users and domain experts seeking to extract insights from data seamlessly and efficiently. Its primary purpose is to accelerate data-driven insights using plain English, thereby eliminating the necessity for extensive technical skills or coding knowledge. This allows even those without a technical background to engage with data through straightforward, natural language queries rather than complex programming or query languages.

DataChat is characterized by its robust feature set. A notable attribute is its no-code interface, which democratizes data analysis by making it accessible to users of all skill levels. The integration of generative AI enhances the platform's capability to interpret and respond to user input, providing insightful analytics without the user needing to write code. Transparency in data analysis is another core feature, as DataChat meticulously documents each analytical step, promoting clear understanding and trust in the insights generated. Moreover, its iterative analytics process allows users to dynamically modify queries, data structures, and hypotheses, fostering a flexible and interactive analytical environment.

In terms of practical applications, DataChat is versatile enough to be implemented across various industries. In financial analysis, it can help identify trends and predict market movements, while in sales analysis, it can optimize strategies and forecast outcomes. Marketing teams can utilize it to gauge campaign performance and refine customer engagement strategies, and customer service departments can leverage it to enhance service delivery by analyzing interactions for pain points and improvement opportunities.

What sets DataChat apart is its unique selling proposition: a user-friendly interface paired with powerful AI capabilities, making it a compelling choice compared to other tools that may require technical expertise. This accessibility is especially appealing as it brings data analysis power to a broader audience, encouraging collaborative and dynamic data exploration. 

While detailed technical specifications are not provided, DataChat operates as a cloud-based platform, suggesting requirements such as internet access and a compatible web browser. Integration-wise, DataChat connects with various data sources such as Google BigQuery and HubSpot, underscoring its capability to handle diverse datasets and integrate smoothly into existing workflows.

Regarding accomplishments, there are no specific achievements, awards, or recent updates documented in the available data. Nonetheless, DataChat remains a significant innovation in the field of data analytics by enabling effortless interaction with data and empowering users to derive meaningful insights without relying on technical expertise.
data.summary: Chat With Data, also known as DataChat, is a no-code generative AI analytics platform designed for business users and domain experts to extract insights from data seamlessly. By using plain English queries instead of complex programming languages, it eliminates the need for technical skills, allowing easy access to data analysis. Key features include its intuitive no-code interface, transparency in analytical steps, and iterative analytics process. It integrates with platforms like Google BigQuery and HubSpot for varied data handling and supports industries like finance, sales, marketing, and customer service in data-driven decision-making.
data.meta_description: DataChat: No-code AI platform transforming data analysis into accessible insights with natural language queries.

faqs.question: What is the ChatPDF backend API?
faqs.answer: The ChatPDF backend API allows users to programmatically extract information from PDF files and create custom chatbots based on those PDFs.

faqs.question: Is there a free tier available for ChatPDF?
faqs.answer: Yes, the free tier includes 500 messages and 5,000 PDF pages per month.

faqs.question: How can I upload a PDF to ChatPDF?
faqs.answer: You can upload PDFs manually on ChatPDF.com or use the API to add PDFs from a URL or by file upload.

faqs.question: What are the limitations on PDF uploads?
faqs.answer: PDFs are limited to 2,000 pages or 32 MB per file.

faqs.question: How do I find my API key?
faqs.answer: The API key can be found in the Developer settings under My Account on ChatPDF.com.

faqs.question: Can I include references to PDF pages in the responses?
faqs.answer: Yes, by adding the 'referenceSources: true' field in the request body, responses will include PDF page references.

faqs.question: Is it possible to stream responses?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can stream responses word by word by including the 'stream: true' field in the request body.

faqs.question: How do I delete PDFs?
faqs.answer: To delete PDFs, use the endpoint provided in the documentation, which involves sending an array of source IDs.

faqs.question: Can I use the API key in frontend applications?
faqs.answer: No, the API key should be kept secret and used only in secure backend environments.

faqs.question: What should I do if I need more than 5,000 PDF pages per month?
faqs.answer: You should look into the paid plans that ChatPDF offers for higher usage.

data.description: ChatPDF is an innovative AI-powered tool designed to revolutionize the way users interact with PDF documents. This groundbreaking application offers an efficient, user-friendly platform for extracting information from PDFs and creating customized chatbots based on the content within. Students can prepare for exams and tackle homework with ease, while researchers can effortlessly navigate through academic papers and scientific articles. Professionals can streamline their workflow by extracting vital information from legal contracts, financial reports, and manuals in a matter of seconds. ChatPDF not only enhances productivity but also supports multiple languages and provides accurate, reference-backed answers, making it an indispensable tool for anyone working with PDF files.
data.summary: The ChatPDF backend API offers robust capabilities for extracting information from PDF files and crafting custom chatbots based on those PDFs. Users can utilize a free tier that includes 500 messages and 5,000 PDF pages per month, with paid plans available for higher usage. This service allows for manual or API-based PDF uploads, supports chatting with uploaded PDFs via stateless messages, and provides options for including PDF page references and streaming responses.

data.description:
Nume is an AI-powered financial tool designed to assist startup founders in managing their finances [1](https://www.nume.finance/). Its core purpose is to act as a virtual CFO for startups, handling financial tasks and providing insights to free up founders' time, reduce stress, and enable data-driven decision-making [1](https://www.nume.finance/).

Key features and capabilities include real-time monitoring of financial numbers, deadlines, and relevant news, with notifications for issues requiring attention [1](https://www.nume.finance/). It also offers report generation, insight generation, automated board report generation, 24/7 query answering, and automated bookkeeping review [1](https://www.nume.finance/). The tool retains a record of financial details and learns from interactions [1](https://www.nume.finance/), with easy onboarding by connecting the user's accounting system and customizing the tool [1](https://www.nume.finance/).

Potential use cases and applications extend to financial planning and analysis, board communication, bookkeeping support, decision-making, and stress reduction [1](https://www.nume.finance/).

Nume's unique selling points include AI-powered automation, 24/7 availability, an intuitive interface, and seamless integration with existing accounting systems [1](https://www.nume.finance/).

Specific technical specifications and requirements are not detailed on its website [1](https://www.nume.finance/). Nume integrates with various accounting systems, but the specific systems supported are not fully listed; the website mentions a "one-click" integration process [1](https://www.nume.finance/).

The website does not list any specific awards or recognition received by Nume [1](https://www.nume.finance/). As of March 19, 2025, it is still in early access, suggesting ongoing development and refinement [1](https://www.nume.finance/).
data.summary:
Nume is the first true AI CFO built specifically for startup founders. Unlike traditional financial tools or dashboards with AI features, Nume functions as a complete financial co-pilot that thinks, acts, and delivers like a seasoned CFO would.

Nume provides strategic financial leadership by analyzing cash flow patterns, forecasting runway scenarios, and delivering high-level recommendations tailored to your business model and growth stage. It doesn't just present data‚Äîit interprets financial information, identifies critical issues before they become problems, and proactively suggests strategic decisions to optimize your financial health and drive business growth.

Working alongside founders 24/7, Nume handles the complex financial thinking that typically requires a high-priced executive hire. It seamlessly connects with your existing accounting system and bank account and translates financial complexity into clear, actionable insights that drive better decision-making. With Nume, founders gain the financial intelligence and strategic guidance of a seasoned CFO at a fraction of the cost, allowing them to focus on building their product and growing their business.

Currently in early access, Nume represents a fundamental shift in how startups approach financial management‚Äîfrom reactive tool-based approaches to having an always-on AI financial partner in your corner.

data.description:
Fluid AI is an enterprise-grade generative AI platform designed to automate workflows and improve decision-making through text and voice interactions [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you)[2](https://www.fluid.ai/). Its core purpose is to empower organizations with autonomous AI that streamlines tasks across various departments and industries [2](https://www.fluid.ai/).

**Key Features and Capabilities:** Fluid AI's core functionality centers around its Agentic AI Workflows, a system that automatically generates and manages AI workflows based on a simple user input: a workflow name and description [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you). The platform leverages a blend of machine learning, large language models (LLMs), prompt engineering, and function-calling APIs to achieve this [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you).

Key features include:
*   **Auto-generated workflows**: Users define the workflow's purpose, and Fluid AI creates the entire workflow automatically [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you).
*   **Intelligent AI agents**: Agents are pre-configured with prompts, instructions, and agent types (LLM function calling or raw output) [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you).
*   **Multi-LLM support**: Different LLMs can be assigned to different agents within a single workflow [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you).
*   **Real-time agent activation**: Agents dynamically respond to user input in real time [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you).
*   **Workflow management tools**: Users can import, export, and visually organize workflows [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you).
*   **Speech-to-text capability**: Users can input queries via voice, enabling hands-free automation [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you).
*   **Agentic RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)**: The system goes beyond simple information retrieval, dynamically refining insights and aligning with business goals [2](https://www.fluid.ai/).

**Potential Use Cases and Applications:** Fluid AI finds applications in diverse areas, including customer support, employee productivity, sales assistance, marketing, operations, supply chain, and human resources [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you)[2](https://www.fluid.ai/)[3](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-workflow-update).

**Unique Selling Points and Advantages:** Fluid AI distinguishes itself through its agentic AI workflows, ease of use, flexibility and adaptability, agentic RAG, multiple deployment options, and extensive integrations [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you)[2](https://www.fluid.ai/).

**Integration Capabilities:** Fluid AI offers extensive integration capabilities with various systems and platforms, including collaboration and knowledge management tools, communication platforms, and financial and big data tools [2](https://www.fluid.ai/)[3](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-workflow-update).

**Recent Updates and Developments:** As of February 12, 2025, Fluid AI released a significant update to its Agentic AI platform, introducing auto-generated workflows [1](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-platform-ai-that-builds-workflows-for-you). A previous update, as of December 4, 2024, focused on streamlining task automation using modular AI agents and real-time data integration [3](https://www.fluid.ai/blog/fluid-ai-agentic-workflow-update).

faqs.answer: ChartGPT offers both light and dark themes, which can be set based on your system preferences or user settings.

faqs.answer: A script is used to automatically apply a theme based on your system preferences or a stored preference in localStorage.

data.description:
ChartGPT is revolutionizing data visualization by offering a user-friendly platform packed with customization options to meet diverse needs. From choosing between various chart types like Bar, Area, and Line charts to selecting your preferred colors including Blue, Purple, Green, Pink, and Yellow, ChartGPT ensures that your data tells the story you want. Users can also toggle chart titles and legends to make their visualizations more informative and engaging.

With ChartGPT, you can seamlessly integrate system themes into your workspace, thanks to its script that dynamically adjusts to either light or dark mode based on your device's settings or your saved preferences. data.headline: Interactive Point-based Manipulation on the Generative Image Manifold

faqs.question: What is DragGAN?
faqs.answer: DragGAN is an interactive tool for manipulating generated images by dragging points to specific target positions, allowing for precise control over pose, shape, expression, and layout.

faqs.question: How does DragGAN differ from existing GAN manipulation methods?
faqs.answer: Unlike existing methods that rely on manually annotated training data or prior 3D models, DragGAN offers flexible and precise control by allowing users to drag points directly on the image.

faqs.question: What are the key components of DragGAN?
faqs.answer: The key components of DragGAN include feature-based motion supervision and a new point tracking approach to keep localizing the handle points.

faqs.question: What categories can DragGAN be applied to?
faqs.answer: DragGAN can be applied to a wide range of categories, including animals, cars, humans, landscapes, and more.

faqs.question: Can DragGAN handle challenging scenarios?
faqs.answer: Yes, DragGAN can produce realistic outputs even in challenging scenarios such as hallucinating occluded content and deforming shapes that follow the object's rigidity.

faqs.question: How does DragGAN achieve realistic results?
faqs.answer: DragGAN operates on the learned generative image manifold of a GAN, enabling it to produce realistic images through precise manipulation techniques.

faqs.question: Is DragGAN suitable for real image manipulation?
faqs.answer: Yes, DragGAN can also be used for manipulating real images through a process known as GAN inversion.

faqs.question: Who developed DragGAN?
faqs.answer: DragGAN was developed by Xingang Pan, Ayush Tewari, Thomas Leimk√ºhler, Lingjie Liu, Abhimitra Meka, and Christian Theobalt, affiliated with institutions like the Max Planck Institute for Informatics and others.

faqs.question: In what conference was DragGAN introduced?
faqs.answer: DragGAN was introduced in the ACM SIGGRAPH 2023 Conference Proceedings.

faqs.question: Where can I find more information on DragGAN?
faqs.answer: More information on DragGAN can be found on their project webpage, where you can also find downloads for the paper and code.

data.description: DragGAN is an innovative tool that provides precise control over image manipulation by allowing users to 'drag' points in an image to desired positions. This enables flexible adjustments in pose, shape, expression, and layout of various objects such as animals, cars, and landscapes. Its feature-based motion supervision combined with a new point-tracking approach ensures realistic outputs even in complex scenarios. This functionality is especially valuable for creative professionals, researchers, and anyone needing high precision in visual content creation.
data.summary: DragGAN introduces an interactive point-based manipulation method for generative adversarial networks (GANs) that allows users to control the pose, shape, expression, and layout of generated images by dragging points to reach precise target positions. The tool uses feature-based motion supervision and a new point tracking approach to localize handle points effectively. Applicable to a wide range of categories including animals, cars, humans, and landscapes, DragGAN can generate realistic images even in challenging scenarios. This method surpasses previous approaches in image manipulation and point tracking.
data.meta_description: DragGAN: an innovative tool for precise image manipulation via interactive point dragging, enabling control over pose, shape, and more.

data.description:
Fellow is a sophisticated meeting management application aimed at enhancing team collaboration and overall productivity. Its principal function is to streamline the entire meeting process, from initial planning stages to post-meeting follow-ups, with the aid of AI-driven automation to improve communication and task management [1](https://help.fellow.app/en/articles/6446399-fellow-basics)[2](https://help.fellow.app/en/articles/8461666-fellow-ai-features).

Fellow goes beyond traditional note-taking by serving as a comprehensive tool to facilitate collaborative meetings and one-on-ones. It integrates seamlessly with popular video conferencing tools such as Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams, providing users with real-time features including automated summaries of meetings [2](https://help.fellow.app/en/articles/8461666-fellow-ai-features).

The platform boasts a variety of features that support every phase of a meeting's lifecycle. In the pre-meeting phase, features like the AI Agenda Builder and Collaborative Agendas empower users to efficiently plan discussions. During meetings, it offers AI Meeting Transcription, Real-time Note-Taking, and Action Item Tracking to ensure engagement and accountability. Post-meeting tools include AI-generated summaries and recorded clips, fostering a culture of transparency and follow-through [3](https://fellow.app/integrations/)[12](https://thebusinessdive.com/fellow-app-review).

Fellow is highly versatile and can be used in numerous scenarios, such as team meetings to enhance collaboration, one-on-one meetings for effective management, and cross-functional meetings for departmental coordination. It also aids remote teams in centralizing communications and supports project management by integrating with tools like Asana and Jira to track progress and assign tasks [11](https://thebusinessdive.com/fellow-app-review)[8](https://help.fellow.app/en/articles/3706094-what-is-fellow).

One of Fellow's significant advantages is its use of AI-powered features, which include innovative tools for meeting transcription, agenda building, and summary generation, setting it apart in the realm of meeting management applications. It also promises a user-friendly experience with its intuitive interface, ensuring ease of use across different teams and settings [3](https://fellow.app/integrations/)[12](https://thebusinessdive.com/fellow-app-review).

While specific technical specifications are not detailed, Fellow operates across various platforms and integrates with numerous services like Slack and Google Calendar. It is widely accessible via web browsers, along with dedicated desktop and mobile applications, ensuring flexibility and responsiveness to user needs [2](https://help.fellow.app/en/articles/8461666-fellow-ai-features).

Though explicit awards or recognitions aren't highlighted, Fellow's high user ratings and positive reviews on platforms like GetApp reflect its strong reputation and market reception. The recent version 4.9 update included new AI features, showcasing the app‚Äôs continuous development and commitment to enhancing user experience [7](https://www.getapp.com/collaboration-software/a/fellow/features/)[4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1D4nfAOOzzU).
data.summary:
Fellow is an AI Meeting Assistant that helps with your entire meeting workflow, from preparation, and running meetings to automatic note-taking, action-item tracking, and integrating with all the systems within your organization. Unlike other AI note-takers, which simply transcribe and summarize meetings, Fellow helps before, during, and after meetings.
Integrating with Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams, it offers features like AI transcription, real-time note-taking, and automated summaries. Tailored for various meeting types, it supports project management by syncing with Asana, Jira, Linear, and other project management tools, as well as Salesforce and HubSpot. Fellow‚Äôs AI capabilities, user-friendly design, and extensive platform accessibility make it a favored choice for modern organizational needs.

faqs.question: What is Kreado AI and what does it do?
faqs.answer: Kreado AI is an AI-powered platform for creating marketing content, including digital human videos, AI-generated marketing copy, and more. Users can generate multilingual videos by inputting text or keywords.

faqs.question: How many videos can I create with Kreado AI?
faqs.answer: There's no limit to the number of digital human videos you can create. The generation time varies, with a one-minute video typically taking 5-10 minutes.

faqs.question: What features does Kreado AI offer?
faqs.answer: The platform offers a range of tools such as AI text-to-speech, voice cloning, avatar creation, and image editing, among others.

faqs.question: How can I utilize my own media for content creation?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kreado AI's "Instant Clone" feature allows uploading videos to create digital human clones, which can then be used in videos.

faqs.question: What are K-coins used for?
faqs.answer: K-coins are the currency within Kreado AI for accessing services such as video creation and voice cloning.

faqs.question: What membership plans are available?
faqs.answer: Membership plans include free, starter, team, and agency, each having different video creation limits and character inputs.

faqs.question: How do I access and download created videos?
faqs.answer: Videos can be accessed and downloaded from the "My Project" section within your account, with a 60-day limit for free users.

faqs.question: What languages and voices does Kreado AI support?
faqs.answer: Kreado AI supports over 140 languages and includes more than 1000 voice timbres and tones.

faqs.question: Can Kreado AI be integrated into other systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, an API is available for professional members, enabling programmatic video creation and more.

faqs.question: Is there a maximum video length?
faqs.answer: The maximum length per scene is 10 minutes, but multiple scenes can be combined for longer videos, up to 500 minutes in total.

data.description:

At its core, Kreado AI is designed to simplify and streamline the process of creating professional-grade videos, making it accessible and efficient for both businesses and individual creators. The platform transforms text into engaging videos, allowing users to input scripts, select their desired avatars and voices, and produce high-quality video content without the need for traditional filming or editing.

Kreado AI features a variety of capabilities that set it apart. Users can choose from a diverse array of AI-generated avatars and voices in over 140 languages, facilitating multilingual video creation. Additionally, the tool supports text-to-video conversion, voice cloning from short audio samples, character cloning for personalized video touches, and advanced AI image processing tools that include features such as background removal and face swapping. The integration of AI-powered copywriting tools for generating marketing copy further supports a seamless video creation workflow.

The platform is versatile, catering to a wide range of use cases including marketing and advertising campaigns, educational tutorials, e-commerce product showcases, news broadcasting, and entertainment content such as short films and animations. These applications highlight the tool's utility across various industries.

Kreado AI distinguishes itself with several unique selling points. Its user-friendly interface enables ease of use for non-technical users, while its multilingual support reaches global audiences. The platform proves to be cost-effective by reducing the traditional costs associated with video production, such as hiring filming crews and voice actors. Speed and efficiency benefits allow for rapid content production, meeting the fast-paced demands of modern media.

There is no current information about awards or recognitions, but recent updates include enhanced broadcast image quality and improvements to user experience, indicating ongoing development and refinement. More detailed information about recent innovations can be accessed via Kreado AI's official platform or documentation.

For potential users, developers, and decision-makers, Kreado AI offers a comprehensive solution for modern video creation needs, leveraging AI's capabilities to deliver high-quality, efficient, and cost-effective video production tools.

data.headline: Pinbot: AI-Powered Private Bookmark Management for Chrome

faqs.question: What is Pinbot?
faqs.answer: Pinbot is a Chrome extension designed to manage your bookmarks privately using AI. It includes features like one-click bookmarking with editable summaries, tag suggestions, natural language search, and offline operation for data privacy.

faqs.question: How does Pinbot ensure my data privacy?
faqs.answer: Pinbot ensures your data privacy by operating entirely offline, meaning all your data is processed and stored on your device, not in the cloud.

faqs.question: Can I use Pinbot for tasks other than bookmarking?
faqs.answer: Yes, Pinbot can be adapted with tags to serve other functions, such as a to-do list or a knowledge database.

faqs.question: What platforms is Pinbot available on?
faqs.answer: Pinbot is currently available as an extension for the Chrome browser.

faqs.question: How does the one-click bookmarking feature work?
faqs.answer: The one-click bookmarking feature pre-fills your bookmark with an editable summary and suggests relevant tags, making the bookmarking process quick and efficient.

faqs.question: What is the natural language search feature?
faqs.answer: The natural language search feature allows you to search your notes and page content using everyday language, making it easier to find what you're looking for.

faqs.question: Who developed Pinbot?
faqs.answer: Pinbot was developed by Kamil, who aims to make advanced AI developments available to everyone without compromising privacy.

data.description: Pinbot is a versatile and privacy-focused tool designed to enhance your bookmarking experience. With its seamless integration into Chrome, Pinbot allows users to effortlessly manage their bookmarks through the power of AI. One of the standout features is its ability to pre-fill bookmarks with editable summaries and suggest relevant tags, streamlining the organization process. This eliminates the need for manually sifting through bookmarks, making it easier to find and reference saved content."Pinbot further enhances productivity by allowing users to search through their notes and page content using natural language. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a specific snippet of information or a particular note, Pinbot‚Äôs intuitive search functionality ensures that you can locate it quickly and efficiently. This feature is particularly valuable for individuals who regularly deal with extensive amounts of data or information, as it minimizes time spent searching and maximizes output. In addition to its powerful search capabilities, Pinbot also offers customization options through the use of tags. Users can adapt Pinbot to function as a to-do list, a knowledge database, or a personalized bookmark manager, depending on their unique needs. Moreover, all these features are designed with user privacy in mind. Pinbot operates entirely offline, ensuring that your data remains secure and private on your device. This commitment to privacy, coupled with a strong emphasis on user-centric development, positions Pinbot as an essential tool for anyone looking to manage their digital content more effectively."
data.summary: Pinbot is an innovative tool designed to manage your bookmarks privately using AI. This extension is available for Chrome and offers a variety of features including one-click bookmarking with editable summaries and tag suggestions, natural language search of notes and page content, and full data privacy by operating offline. Additionally, Pinbot can be adapted with tags to serve as a to-do list or knowledge database, making it a versatile addition to your digital toolkit.

data.description:
Picsart Creative APIs enable developers to integrate powerful AI-powered image and video editing capabilities into their applications without building these features from scratch [1](https://docs.picsart.io/). The suite offers comprehensive tools for image manipulation, including background removal, image upscaling, quality enhancement, and format conversion between JPG, PNG, WEBP, and TIFF [2](https://techcrunch.com/2022/02/09/picsart-brings-its-creative-tools-to-developers-with-new-api/).

The platform provides advanced generative AI capabilities through its GenAI API for text-to-image and text-to-text generation, along with AI Avatars API and beta support for inpainting [1](https://docs.picsart.io/). The video editing suite, currently in beta, enables effect application and video manipulation [1](https://docs.picsart.io/). A standout feature is the Photo and Video Editor SDK, which allows businesses to embed a fully functional web-based editor directly into their applications [12](https://docs.picsart.io/docs/creative-apis-getting-started).

These APIs serve diverse industries, from e-commerce product optimization to marketing campaign content creation. E-commerce platforms utilize the tools for product image enhancement and automated resizing [5](https://docs.picsart.io/docs/creative-apis-getting-started), while marketing teams leverage them for generating personalized content and improving customer support materials [3](https://www.whippy.ai/integrations/picsart).

The platform distinguishes itself through enterprise-grade features, including advanced AI algorithms for superior image processing [2](https://techcrunch.com/2022/02/09/picsart-brings-its-creative-tools-to-developers-with-new-api/), guaranteed 99.5% uptime [1](https://docs.picsart.io/), and robust security measures including SOC2 certification and GDPR compliance [13](https://medium.com/@picsartforbusiness/introducing-picsart-for-developers-fd19ece38dcf).

Integration options are extensive, with support for popular platforms like Zapier, Make, and Integrately [1](https://docs.picsart.io/). Developers can access comprehensive documentation and SDKs, including a TypeScript SDK [4](https://github.com/PicsArt/picsart-creative-apis-ts-sdk), making implementation straightforward and efficient.

As part of a company ranked among the top 20 most downloaded apps worldwide [6](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20220209005789/en/Making-its-World-class-Creative-Tools-Available-to-Businesses-Picsart-Launches-API-Program), the APIs continue to evolve with regular feature updates and expanded enterprise capabilities. Recent developments include enhanced generative AI features and the introduction of the comprehensive Photo and Video Editor SDK [1](https://docs.picsart.io/), demonstrating the platform's commitment to innovation and meeting evolving market needs.
data.summary:
Transforming Creativity with AI-Powered Image & Video Editing Tools
Picsart Creative APIs offer a powerful suite of AI-driven tools designed to elevate your visual content workflows and business efficiency. Whether you're a developer, product owner or entrepreneur, our platform enables seamless integration of cutting-edge image and video processing capabilities into your projects.

What We Offer:
Programmable Image APIs: Remove and change backgrounds, upscale and enhance images, apply filters and effects, and adjust visuals with AI-powered precision.
Generative AI (GenAI) APIs: Create unique content with Text-to-Image generator, Avatar Generation, and Replace AI set of tools for inpainting and outpainting.
Programmable Video APIs: Edit, upscale, and optimize videos effortlessly for any platform or audience.
Format Conversions: Convert PNG to SVG, JPG, WEBP, and other formats for enhanced compatibility and performance.
Specialized Tools: Generate patterns, apply AI effects, and compress images to streamline design and development workflows.

Accessible to Everyone:
Picsart services are available not only via API integration, but also on popular workflow automation platforms and iPaaS solutions like Zapier, Make.com, Integrately, Pabbly, and Elastic.io.
Non-engineers such as designers, content managers, and store managers can use our tools through easy-to-install plugins and apps, including: Figma, Sketch, Miro, GIMP and CLI Tool.

Why Choose Picsart Creative APIs?
What makes Picsart different is that we can cover all your visual content flows offering a wide range of AI powered image editing solutions. We also have comprehensive and well written documentation and guides, and super easy set-up which allows you to start using Picsart tools in the first hour after sign-up. 
Our tools grow with you‚Äînew features and capabilities are added every month to keep your creativity limitless.

data.description:
Consensus is an AI-powered academic search engine designed to revolutionize the way researchers, students, and professionals access and understand scientific literature [1](https://consensus.app/home/). Its core purpose is to make the world's best knowledge accessible to everyone, streamlining the research process and providing time-saving AI insights [1](https://consensus.app/home/).

The platform aggregates over 200 million research papers across all scientific fields, allowing users to search using natural language queries [5](https://aitechfy.com/aitool/consensus/)[7](https://www.toolsforhumans.ai/ai-tools/consensus). Key features include:

- AI-powered insights with summaries, analyses, and a "Consensus Meter" to gauge agreement among studies [1](https://consensus.app/home/)
- Advanced filtering options for sample size, study design, methodology, and more [1](https://consensus.app/home/)
- Paper-level insights extracting key information from individual studies [1](https://consensus.app/home/)
- Quality indicators for citations, journal quality, and study type [1](https://consensus.app/home/)
- "Ask Paper" beta feature for direct questions to full-text PDFs [2](https://consensus.app/home/blog/consensus-product-feature-updates/)
- Multilingual support for over 100 languages [2](https://consensus.app/home/blog/consensus-product-feature-updates/)
- Export capabilities to reference management tools [2](https://consensus.app/home/blog/consensus-product-feature-updates/)

Consensus is valuable for students conducting literature reviews, researchers identifying key findings, clinicians seeking evidence-based answers, and writers sourcing scientific insights [1](https://consensus.app/home/)[5](https://aitechfy.com/aitool/consensus/).

Unique selling points include its focus on scientific consensus, AI-driven efficiency, transparency in sourcing, and user-friendly interface [1](https://consensus.app/home/). The platform combines keyword and AI-powered vector search, leveraging both OpenAI and custom-trained LLMs [1](https://consensus.app/home/)[2](https://consensus.app/home/blog/consensus-product-feature-updates/).

Integration capabilities include connections with reference managers, CRMs, and an API for developers [2](https://consensus.app/home/blog/consensus-product-feature-updates/)[3](https://goconsensus.com/integrations/). Consensus has achieved significant growth, boasting over two million users globally [1](https://consensus.app/home/).

Recent updates include the introduction of the "Ask Paper" beta feature, expanded language support, new filtering options, improved export functionality, and the launch of Consensus Teams for collaborative research [2](https://consensus.app/home/blog/consensus-product-feature-updates/).

Consensus offers a freemium model with a free plan for basic use and a premium plan for unlimited AI features [5](https://aitechfy.com/aitool/consensus/)[7](https://www.toolsforhumans.ai/ai-tools/consensus).
data.summary: Consensus is an AI-powered academic search engine that revolutionizes how researchers, students, and professionals access scientific literature. It aggregates over 200 million research papers and allows users to perform effective searches using natural language queries. Key features include AI-powered insights such as summaries and analyses, advanced filtering, paper-level insights, and multilingual support, with integration capabilities for reference managers and CRMs. The platform has a freemium model, offering a free plan and a premium one with enhanced features, making it invaluable for literature reviews, evidence-based discovery, and sourcing scientific insights.
data.meta_description: Discover Consensus, the AI tool for effortless academic research with 200M+ papers.

faqs.question: What is PowerMode AI?
faqs.answer: PowerMode AI is an AI-powered tool that helps users create professional and polished presentations quickly by answering just a few questions.

faqs.question: How does PowerMode AI work?
faqs.answer: By leveraging artificial intelligence, PowerMode AI generates a complete and stunning presentation based on responses to a few simple prompts.
